Agile Culinary Group is proudly partnered with the GRUB Collective in Tempe, AZ. We provide Interim and Part Time management professionals, Professional Chef services, Full Service Consulting, Event Catering, and Production optimization tools.

•	Current contracts with Beneplates (organic therapeutic diet meal service), Fran's Kitchen (organic therapeutic diet meal service), Nature's Purpose (nutritional meal service), and JPP Apothecary (classic method top tier mineral broths and stocks production)•	Manage food production and staff to provide exceptional food and experience for clients.  •	Develop menus that increase sales and customer satisfaction. •	Ongoing concept development for client brands that disrupt their relevant food industries.•	Develop methods and practices to standardize recipes and food procurement to increase profits and food quality overall.

Director of Operations, Arizona Event Catering, Mesa, AZ 				•	Manage food production and event staff to provide an exceptional event experience for clients.  •	Develop catering menus that increase sales and customer satisfaction. •	Ongoing concept development for niche catering brands that disrupt the local catering industry.•	Develop methods and practices to standardize recipes and food procurement to increase profits    and food quality overall.

•	Developed concept and execution of five software programs for retail and restaurant management based on client specifications to secure initial launch customer.•	Worked to provide strategic, operational, and fiscal leadership while working to reach the company’s long term goals and maintain organizational vision.•	Implemented Agile development as the SCRUM master for our team to increase productivity and communication to ensure deadlines are met.

•	Developed retail and catering menus that increased sales and client satisfaction.  •	Developed the menu and produced the catering events at each location along with pricing.  •	Responsible for the budget and accounting by way of a weekly on-line reporting system that includes inventory, purchasing, labor expense, billing, invoice processing, sales entry, and benchmarking. •	Supervised production staff which included hiring, training, progressive discipline, and termination. •	Became the touring manager and handled accounts in the Phoenix Metro area. Companies I have worked with include Honeywell, State Farm, General Dynamic, and CVS Caremark.•	Re-organized staffing and scheduling for labor cost reduction at select locations•	Re-structured food programs that reduced labor and food costs while maintaining steady growth at select locations.

summary: Throughout my career, I have earned a track record of success in managing complex production systems, technology focused initiatives, and overseeing and directing all required customer support efforts.  Conceiving, developing, and executing the strategies and initiatives that drive revenue, growth, efficiency, and innovative design are my passions.  I have the distinction of being an operations focused executive who possesses the experience, capabilities, and judgment for taking a business to its next level of success and/or resolving the barriers that impede its ability to grow and prosper.  I take an integral and leading position in managing the project lifecycle, troubleshooting, and finding elegant solutions. I excel at collaboration having worked closely with multiple departments in multiple fields to orchestrate a company’s objectives.The bottom line is that I love managing and consulting in highly collaborative environments with brilliant people to find elegant solutions. I have proven to be a quick study and will immerse myself in any project in front me without losing the ability to multi-task and always keeping the big picture in crisp focus.  I am an executive who has amassed a long and diverse portfolio of creating and managing high value projects.  I have experience in software development, culinary concepts and branding, food production operations, food service management, and building commercial kitchens.  At the heart of everything I have ever done is operations.
name: Sean Roe
